Message:
The other Charlotte’s violent,
but she’s actually super sweet.

Whenever I get hurt,
she always throws a fit
and stands up for me.

But, it looks like
people are scared of her...

Every time she comes out,
everyone runs away,
screaming, “Witch!”

She’s pretty sensitive about
how people feel about her,
and it doesn’t take much
provoking for her to blow up...
This spell gives me a magic smile...

A happy person always
beams with joy.

So, as long as I’m smiling,
I’m sure she’ll keep her
anger in check.

That’s why I decided to
cast this magic spell...
